spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door placement is mostly accurate, though some door swings in the hallway area are simplified. Window groupings in the living room and nook correctly reflect the blueprint patterns.

structural_fidelity.notes: Complies with the floating model constraint on a dark background. All rooms from the 2D plan are present, including the garage and utility room. No text or measurement lines present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is well-placed and scaled. The kitchen island (angled) and the laundry units in the utility room show high attention to the original layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to the style constraints. Clean low-poly geometry, flat shading, soft ambient lighting, and a precise isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Minor distortion in the door swing orientation for several interior closets compared to the blueprint.
Slight reinterpretation of the Master Bath layout; the tub and shower stall placement is slightly condensed compared to the blueprint's spatial allowance.
